dict.acceptation: 背，背部；背面，反面；后面，后部；（椅子等的）靠背；
使后退；支持；加背书于；下赌注于；
背部的；后面的；以前的；拖欠的；

sent.orig: In this paper, a Boiler Operation Optimizing model is built by using BP (Back-Propagation) Neural Network.
sent.trans: 本文引入人工神经网络之BP网络(Back-Propagation)，建立了锅炉的运行优化模型。

sent.orig: Please ask her to call me back when she's.
sent.trans: back.她回来时请让她给我回个电话。

sent.orig: Compton Back-Scattering is a new type of non-destructive inspection technology.
sent.trans: 康普顿背散射(Compton Back-scattering)技术是一种新型的无损检测技术。

sent.orig: The three players in the back row are called left back, center back and right back.
sent.trans: 后排的三名是左后卫、中后卫和右后卫。

sent.orig: Back in the West. Back on the court. Back as a starting center.
sent.trans: 回到西部，回到球场，回到全新的球场。
